info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 6:39PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 715 PM MST... At 638 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Phoenix International Raceway, or over Avondale, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glendale, Surprise, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, El Mirage, Tolleson, Youngtown, Waddell, Cashion, Litchfield Park, Perryville, Luke AFB, Liberty, Phoenix International Raceway, Surprise Stadium, Camelback Ranch, Estrella Mountain Park and Estrella Mountain Ranch. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 114 and 135. US Highway 60 between mile markers 142 and 143. AZ Route 101 between mile markers 2 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
